Technical Assistance – Shortlisted Consulting Firms 
 
 
 
VIET NAM, SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF 
 
 
TA No. 8849-VIE: Support to Border Areas Development - 01 Preparation for Support to 
Border Areas Development Project (48189-001) 
 
RFP Issuance Date: 12 February 2015 
 
 
Firm Name   :   Joint venture between CONTRANS AB and Transport Engineering 
Consultant Joint Stock Company No.2, in association with ASEAN
